stage.name: Description
stage.initialvalue: Batch created by nightly automated test

stage.name: Create a batch 1
stage.narrative: Create a new batch ready to receive documents.

input.name: Batch Type ID
input.narrative: The ID of the type of batch to create.

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name of the new batch

input.name: Description
input.narrative: A description of the new batch

output.name: Batch ID
output.narrative: The ID of the created batch

stage.name: Add file 1 to batch 1
stage.narrative: Adds a document to an existing batch.

input.name: Batch ID
input.narrative: The ID of the created batch

input.name: File
input.narrative: The name of the new batch

stage.narrative: Adds a document to an existing batch.

input.name: Batch ID
input.narrative: The ID of the created batch

input.name: File
input.narrative: The name of the new batch

stage.name: Add file 3 to batch 1
stage.narrative: Adds a document to an existing batch.

input.name: Batch ID
input.narrative: The ID of the created batch

input.name: File
input.narrative: The name of the new batch

stage.name: Submit batch 1
stage.narrative: Submits a batch of documents for processing.

input.name: Batch ID
input.narrative: The ID of the created batch

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: If provided, overrides the default queue to put results for this document type in

stage.name: Test 1
stage.narrative: Tests ideal scenario, of adding several documents to a batch, with all possible fields populated with valid data

stage.narrative: Tests completing only the minimum mandatory fileds, Adding the same file to the same batch in a single session, and adding the same file to different batches in the same session
